Scripts.OnEnter: GameTooltip:SetOwner(self,"TOPLEFT",30,-80) GameTooltip:AddLine("DKP记录仪") GameTooltip:AddLine("点击打开面板") GameTooltip:Show()
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT",-130,0) GameTooltip:SetText("双击可进行修改", nil, nil, nil, nil, true) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnClick: if CurrentView ~= "EventFrame" then RevertChange() end self:GetParent().data.checked = self:GetChecked() NewFrame.Container.update()
local checked= self:GetChecked() if (checked) then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn"); else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff"); end SwitchAutoAnnounce(checked)

Scripts.OnLoad: _G[self:GetName() .. "Text"]:SetText("所有") if CurrentView ~= "ItemFrame" then self:Show() else self:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick: local data = self:GetParent().Container.data for i=1,#data do data[i].checked=true end self:GetParent().Container.update() self:SetChecked(false)

Scripts.OnLoad: _G[self:GetName() .. "Text"]:SetText("全团") if CurrentView ~= "ItemFrame" then self:Show() else self:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick: local buttons = self:GetParent().Container.buttons print("选择全团") self:SetChecked(false)

Scripts.OnLoad: _G[self:GetName() .. "Text"]:SetText("在线") if CurrentView ~= "ItemFrame" then self:Show() else self:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick: local buttons = self:GetParent().Container.buttons print("选择在线") self:SetChecked(false)

Scripts.OnLoad: _G[self:GetName() .. "Text"]:SetText("反选") if CurrentView ~= "ItemFrame" then self:Show() else self:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick: local data = self:GetParent().Container.data for i=1,#data do data[i].checked=not data[i].checked end self:GetParent().Container.update() self:SetChecked(false)
